settings.title: A year's worth of socks

settings.text:
We are on a mission to create happy and healthy organic products that are gentle on our skin and our planet.

Founded and led by a mom of 3.

We are located in Toronto, ON, Canada.
We ship across Canada, the USA, and select international countries.

We are proudly a GOTS Certified Organic brand.

Learn more about our story here.
settings.title: About Us

settings.text: Sign up to be the first to access new styles plus 10% off your first order.
settings.title: Sign up and save

settings.text: Sold out 4 times in the last year! Our matching family socks are rated a top Father's Day gift.
settings.title: MATCHING FAMILY SOCKS

settings.subtitle: organic cotton underwear
settings.text:
Our organic cotton underwear is completely free from harmful chemicals and designed to maximize comfort.
Sizes 18 months - 12 years
settings.title: Go clean where it matters the most.

settings.testimonial: Absolutely perfect! My husband likes these very much: they’re thin and stretchy while also being soft. The patterns are also very pleasing. I got them for him and our infant daughter and they fit her pretty well too at 10 months (she’s on the tall side, though!). The traction dots are a nice touch.
settings.author: Sandra

settings.testimonial: These are the best PJs!! My kids love them - always the first pair of PJs they wear after laundry day!!
settings.author: Becky

settings.testimonial:
My son was diagnosed with double Club Foot when he was just over a year old and after 8 weeks in double leg casts and surgery on his heel he was recently fitted for an orthotic brace he currently wears for 23 hours a day! ...
So far the socks have been wonderful for him, no irritation or red marks and they fit so well under the brace. 
.. read full here
settings.author: Alicia

settings.testimonial:
Bought these for my two year old granddaughter because her feet were peeling!
Not only did the socks come very quickly (both times I ordered) but after just a couple days the peeling had stopped!
We were so happy we bought more!!!
She loves getting the parcel and she LOVES the happy colours on the socks!"
settings.author: Melanie S.

settings.text:
As moms, we are adamant about the little details. Little details matter. They make the difference between our kids even wearing socks or slipping and falling on our hardwood floors. 

We've removed everything that gets in the way of comfort and safety - from annoying toe seams to grips that actually don't grip. 

We sweat the details so you don't have to.
settings.title: We sweat the details. So you don't have to.

settings.subtitle: Our Story
settings.text:
Melita, (pictured here with her kids) designed the first set of socks for her baby boy. A pair that was gentle on his skin and helped resolve his eczema.

Every one of our products is made from GOTS certified organic cotton or responsibly sourced merino wool, and produced in OEKO-Tex-100 certified facilities to ensure the absence of harmful chemicals and toxins found in a shocking 90% of baby and kids socks and other clothing items.

We are proudly a GOTS certified organic brand, which means we are regularly audited and certified against the highest environmental and ethical standards in the industry.

We strive to create products that are healthy and comfortable. Products that are gentle on our skin and on our planet.

settings.text_1: From product to packaging, materials are chosen to minimize the impact we have on our environment - #thereisnoplanetB
settings.title: Good for you. Good for our community.
settings.text_3: We reach some of the world's most vulnerable children, through Mary's Meals and our 1 pair = 1 meal initiative. To date we have donated close to 28,000 meals. Learn more here.
settings.text_2: Q for Quinn is a GOTS certified organic cotton brand (license number - ONE-3883). In order to be GOTS certified, we are evaluated amongst the highest sustainability and social criteria in the textile industry - including (but not limited to): use of organic materials, non-toxic colours and dyes, providing safe working conditions, and paying fair wages. Not only is each one of our manufacturers GOTS certified. We are too!

settings.subtitle: OUR CAUSE
settings.text: "Growing up in Sri Lanka, where poverty is widespread, has helped me truly appreciate how fortunate my children and I are. My children may never learn or understand what it means to go to school hungry, or not be able to go to school at all. What they can learn is the importance of giving back to other children that are less fortunate. We donate a meal with every purchase, making you the most important part of our cause. We cannot thank you enough for supporting our business and cause!" - Melita Cyril, Founder and CEO
settings.title: 1 Pair = 1 Meal

settings.subtitle: WE DONATE
settings.text:
We are excited to support Mary's Meals' goal - that every child receives a daily meal in a place of education. Mary's Meals has developed a simple solution to world hunger and we are incredibly proud to support their mission. 

Mary's Meals, works in 18 different countries and is run by an army of volunteers. 93 cents for every $1 is spent directly on charitable activities. Mary's Meals reaches over 1.4 million children every day and counting!
settings.title: Ending hunger though Mary's Meals

settings.title: TYPE

settings.subtitle: Our Story
settings.text:
It all started with a desire to create a pair of seamless socks for a baby with eczema.

It continues with an unwavering focus to create healthy organic basics that redefine comfort for your family and make a positive impact on our planet and communities.
settings.title: We sweat the details, so you don’t have to.

settings.text: Gift it and save 20% on orders of $200
settings.title: Save 20% with code GIFTIT

settings.text: After three years of research and development we have developed a few style options catered to your individual needs. Find your match using our sock guide.
settings.title: Sock Style Guide
Gentle on our skin. Gentle on our planet.

settings.subtitle: Matching Family
settings.text:
Create the perfect #twinning moments with your little ones in our GOTS certified organic cotton socks! Tested free of harmful chemicals, you don't have to compromise safety or comfort to have fun, bright socks.

We offer great patterns in kids and adult sizes, all made with seamless toes.

Most styles have silicone grips for kids (1- 6 years). Please see collection for details.
settings.title: Match Mommy and Daddy!

settings.subtitle: ORGANIC BASICS
settings.text:
Our Basics Collection features all the good stuff. Made with 80-98% Organic cotton and low impact dyes.

These socks are suitable for sensitive skin, but also have fun colours, and a mix & match design.

With seamless toes for comfort and silicone grips to prevent slips!

Sizes Newborn - Adult!
settings.title: The Perfect Everyday Socks

settings.text:
Made from gentle, sustainable materials like GOTS certified organic cotton, ZQ certified merino wool.

With azo-free low impact dyes, free from harsh chemicals and with seamless toes.

Depending on your little ones preferences, we have a few different options to choose from:
settings.title: Our socks have a few common features:
Get matched with the perfect pair!
settings.subheading: Not sure which socks to get? Learn more about our different styles

settings.subtitle: The Pure Collection
settings.text:
The Pure Collection is our most gentle sock yet! Made without dyes, so the colour you see is natural cotton.

This collection is ideal for a newborn baby or any little one suffering from very sensitive skin or eczema.

No grips are included in this style, but as always we have our seamless toe closure.
settings.title: 98% Organic Cotton

settings.subtitle: Mix & Match fun
settings.text:
We have created a 3 pair set of GOTS Certified socks to be worn mismatched for 9 different combinations of cute.

Your kids will love the patterns, and choosing what they wear helps build independence.

As with all our socks, this collection features seamless toes for comfort. Most styles have silicone grips (1- 6 years)., please view the collection for details.
settings.title: Fun, bold, colourful

settings.subtitle: Merino Collection
settings.text:
Unlike conventional wool, merino wool is known for being exceptionally soft.

Our merino wool is ZQ certified, the most ethical choice for wool.

Merino wool wicks away sweat and helps regulate temperature, making these socks great for eczema and sweaty feet.

Made with seamless toes, and with silicone grips for kids. Also available in adult sizes!
settings.title: Soft, breathable Merino Wool Socks
